title: Meeting Our Idols - A Conversation with Colin
description:
Today's topics were submitted by Edward Kenway. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Meeting Dan Aykroyd: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6CGX4YC_SwQ&list=SPOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6&index=18
